definition: Gasol (name)/Pau Gasol (1980-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)/Marc Gasol (1985-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: How are Lakers fans supposed to interpret these comments?
sentences.chinese: 湖人球迷应当这么解读加索尔的表态呢？

sentences.english: But make no mistake; Gasol and Bryant are totally geeked about the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 了，加索尔和科比在奥林匹克运动会上完全没经验。

sentences.english: Do you put Lamar on him or Gasol?
sentences.chinese: 让拉玛尔或加索尔防他？

sentences.english: Biarritz, Pau and Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port are here.
sentences.chinese: 比亚里茨，加索尔，圣让皮耶德港也在那里。

sentences.english: Pau and Andrew, their work on the boards tonight was sensational.
sentences.chinese: 加索尔和拜纳姆在保护篮板球上是很出色的。

sentences.english: At least they have learned they can't wait for Bynum and Gasol to return and rescue them.
sentences.chinese: 至少他们学到了不能等拜纳姆和加索尔来救他们。

sentences.english: Gasol hit a pair of free throws, but the Lakers could not catch up.
sentences.chinese: 加索尔两罚全中，但是湖人还是没能追上。

sentences.english: Gasol led the Lakers with 21 points and 11 rebounds.
sentences.chinese: 加索尔带领湖人比赛，拿下21分11个篮板球。

sentences.english: The Grizzlies are 5-20 since trading Pau Gasol to the Lakers.
sentences.chinese: 自从交易走加索尔之后，灰熊的战绩是5胜20负。

sentences.english: The Lakers with Gasol are about 7 points better on offense than the freaking Suns.
sentences.chinese: 有了加索尔的湖人要比狂热的太阳进攻还要高7分。

definition: Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
Kobe Bryant (1978-2020), Los Angeles Lakers NBA star
pinyin: Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4

definition: Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
